help-file.title: NECROLYTE
help-file.content:
The Necrolyte possesses heightened senses capable of detecting the dead. He is a master in the use of staves and can summon the very shadows to serve him.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Staff Mastery
Innate Ability --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: Vision of the Dead
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 4th circle: Darkness 9th circle: Raise Shadow
